name: Gyrix
description:
Fly your spaceship through countless planets in the psychadelic world of Gyrix! This skill based game will test your abilities and your reaction speed, how far can you go without losing?

Features an infinite world, that goes as far as your skill allows it, accompanied by great audio (thanks to Bensound.com) and fast gameplay.

In the end, share your scores with Facebook friends and compete to become the top scorer in Gyrix!

Engage now with its stunning world and overcome every obstacle into becoming the best of all!
